about_the_game:
Dive into the enchanting world of "Shawley - Zoo of Wonders," a captivating third-person platformer adventure where magic and bravery collide.


Follow the journey of Shawley, a courageous girl adorned with a big, mysterious scarf and armed with a fun hammer, on her quest to rescue escaped animals from a magical zoo. The creatures have vanished through mystical portals leading to worlds filled with challenges and wonders, and it's up to Shawley to bring them back to ensure the zoo's grand reopening.

Embark on a journey through five unique and fantastical realms: a sprawling medieval castle, a vast and scorching desert, the icy slopes of a frozen mountain, the depths of a dark mining cave, and a spooky floating island village. Each world offers a distinct set of obstacles, enemies, and intricate jump sections that will test your skill and dexterity. Shawley's mission is to outsmart and overcome these challenges to rescue the animals hidden within, with each stage housing nine animals eagerly awaiting their hero.

Shawley isn't just any adventurer; her arsenal includes an array of dynamic moves and abilities. From defeating enemies with precise jumps or powerful hammer strikes to navigating treacherous terrains with her jump, double jump, dash, and high jump skills. And when the stakes are high, Shawley can use her scarf to protect herself from harm when falling from great heights.

Collecting stars throughout your journey is crucial, as they unlock new weapons and skills provided by the zookeepers, enhancing Shawley's abilities and preparing her for the challenges that lie ahead. With every animal rescued and star collected, new stages unfold, revealing more of the game's rich and immersive world.

"Shawley - Zoo of Wonders" is more than just a platformer; it's a heartwarming tale of adventure, courage, and the magical bond between humans and animals. Prepare to leap, fight, and puzzle your way through this wondrous zoo rescue mission!
